snippet: A suspect who the police say fired randomly at cars surrendered to troopers after a short pursuit and, so far, has been charged with driving under the influence.
abstract: Oklahoma officials say they have arrested Jeremy Doss Hardy for allegedly fatally shooting two people in separate cars as he drove past them on Interstate highway, randomly firing at vehicles; state troopers say Hardy could be charged with first-degree murder.
lead_paragraph: A suspect who the police say fired randomly at cars surrendered to troopers after a short pursuit and, so far, has been charged with driving under the influence.

headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Plains; Oklahoma: Highway Shootings Leave Two Dead
